sentences.english: During the Sui and Tang dynasties, the central government strengthened its rule over Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐時期，中央政府加強對新疆的統治。

sentences.english: Japan and china are close neighbours separated by only a strip of water.
sentences.chinese: 中日兩國一衣帶水，隋唐以前，兩國已有文化交往。

sentences.english: Chen Ziang is one of the most outstanding prose writers in the Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 陳子昂是隋唐五代巴蜀最優秀的散文家之一。

sentences.english: In the Sui and Tang dynasties, block technology was invented, which improved the speed of printing.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐時，發明了雕版印刷術，提高了印書的速度。

sentences.english: The reform of Taihe New System in Northern Zhou shaped the financial systems in Sui and Tang Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 太和新制，經過北周改革，最終形成隋唐財政制度。

sentences.english: Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties were important time for Chinese horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐五代時期是我國園藝業發展史上的重要時期。

sentences.english: Imperial examination had been one of the key bonds between the state and society since Sui and Tang Dynasties in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 科舉是隋唐以來國家與社會聯繫的關鍵性紐帶。

sentences.english: After the Sui and Tang Dynasties Longmen Grottoes only.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐以後的龍門石窟纔出現。

sentences.english: Since the Sui and Tang dynasties, the Gongshu is the north-south sea and land transport routes and busy trading port.
sentences.chinese: 自隋唐以來，拱墅就是南北水陸交通要道和繁華商埠。

sentences.english: Okazaki Fumio specializing in the previous socioeconomic history of the Sui and Tang.

sentences.english: The second part mainly reviews the acceptance situations of Baozhao in Sui and Tang Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 下編主要考察鮑照在隋唐時期的接受狀況，分爲三章。

definition: Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
last years of the Sui dynasty/early 7th century AD
